author: dicka
msg: Changes to resolve AXISCPP-788 - ambiguous use of unsigned integer for xsd:negativeInteger and xsd:nonPositiveInteger data types.
Have now changed to be signed, the internal checks for MaxInclusive, etc. will correctly prevent the use of +ve values.
